General.Name: Duran-Dogan Basim ve Ambalaj Sanayi AS
General.Description: Duran Dogan Basim ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides packaging products in Turkey, Europe, the United Stated, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia Pacific region. It provides paper, cardboard, and various plastic materials in rolls and sheets to produce various packaging, printing, cutting, gluing, and laminating works on aluminum, metal, tin etc. The company offers packaging products for food, beverage, medical, home care, personal care, and boutique sectors. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1934 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
